title: An Unfathomable Geek
description:
Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss Tim’s gigantic life win, Patrick Wisdom on the mic for Sunday Night Baseball, the Cardinals’ balance of youth and experience, the Yankees continuing to win with fixable problems, the Braves’ winning streak, the Angels’ long streak, the Phillies firing Joe Girardi, and Rays players refusing to wear rainbow-colored logos for “Pride Night.” Then, Sarah Langs stops by to talk about covering the 2016 World Series for ESPN, Andrew McCutcheon snapping his 0-32 streak with a walk-off single, the Yankees’ perfect game-bids and Noah Syndergaard’s struggles. Plus, Boog Sciambi with David Ross and Oliver Marmol.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
